summary: Replaces 2 scripts and adds a non-running quest with functions to add and get vampire or normal version of races, for use with the PlayerVampireScript and the CompanionsHousekeepingScript (included new versions).
descriptionHtml:
Replaces 2 scripts and adds a non-running quest with functions to add and get vampire or normal version of races, for use with the PlayerVampireScript and the CompanionsHousekeepingScript (included new versions).

This is done to alleviate issues with modders creating new races and having to manually ADD only their race to these scripts.  Now, with a simple quest addition, their races will all work without bothering each other.

Some modifications to their original race packages will be necessary to use this.  Please read the Read-Me in order to understand this fully.

Feel free to ask questions in the Discussion area, and please endorse.  And if you have favorite races, tell their authors you\'d like them to use this mod so you can play them all without worries.
author: GuruSR
